title: Department of Commerce
body:
Preparing Future Business Leaders

The Department of Commerce at Amer Maharaja P.G. College is committed to providing high-quality education in the fields of business, finance, and trade. As we progress through the 2026 academic session, our curriculum is designed to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical industry requirements.

Key Areas of Study

  • Accountancy & Business Statistics: Mastering financial reporting, auditing, and data analysis.
  • Economic Administration & Financial Management (EAFM): Understanding banking systems, financial markets, and economic policies.
  • Business Administration: Developing leadership, human resource management, and organizational skills.

Modern Learning Approach

We go beyond textbooks by integrating digital literacy and real-world exposure. Our students receive training in modern accounting software and financial tools to stay competitive in the digital economy. We also host regular guest lectures from corporate professionals and successful entrepreneurs to provide students with a firsthand look at the business world.

Career Opportunities

A degree in Commerce opens doors to diverse sectors including Banking, Insurance, Corporate Accounting, and E-commerce. Our dedicated career guidance cell provides support for students pursuing professional qualifications such as CA, CS, and CMA. Our graduates are equipped with the analytical mindset and ethical values needed to excel in the global economy.
